card.name: Ancient Tomb
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no glory to be gained in the kingdom of the dead.—Vec tomb inscription

card.name: Boseiju, Who Shelters All
card.property: Boseiju, Who Shelters All enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Pay 2 life: Add {C} to your mana pool. If that mana is spent on an instant or sorcery spell, that spell can't be countered by spells or abilities.

card.name: Cephalid Coliseum
card.property: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Cephalid Coliseum deals 1 damage to you. Threshold — {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Coliseum: Target player draws three cards, then discards three cards. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Desert
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step.

card.name: Dryad Arbor
card.property: (Dryad Arbor isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, and it has "{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.")

card.name: Forbidden Orchard
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Whenever you tap Forbidden Orchard for mana, target opponent creates a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Glacial Chasm
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Glacial Chasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Creatures you control can't attack. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Grove of the Burnwillows
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Each opponent gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring is the most beautiful season in the grove, when the new leaves open from their ember-buds in a race of leaping flames.

card.name: High Market
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it can't be had here, it can't be had on any world.

card.name: Maze of Ith
card.property: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Murmuring Bosk
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.) As Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Treefolk card from your hand. If you don't, Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Murmuring Bosk deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Shivan Gorge
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}{R}, {T}: Shivan Gorge deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
card.property: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth's corpse is a wound in the universe. His foul blood seeps out, infecting the land with his final curse."—Lord Windgrace

card.name: Vesuva
card.property: You may have Vesuva enter the battlefield tapped as a copy of any land on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is everywhere you've ever been.

card.name: Windbrisk Heights
card.property: Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {W}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn.
